Package islands.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
islands.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, EventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements MouseListener
Controller for the game.

      Parameters:
      size - the size of the board
      whiteClass - the white player
      blackClass - the black player
      vd - the view delegate

    • toggleTurn

      public void toggleTurn()
      Changes the turn from white to black or vice versa.

    • setDelegate

      public void setDelegate(GameController.ViewDelegate vd)
      Sets the view delegate and starts the game.
      Parameters:
      vd - the view delegate

    • tryRowColFromPoint

      public void tryRowColFromPoint(RowColPair position)
      Tries to play a game piece at the specified position. If the piece can be played, this updates the model and view, including detecting whether the game has ended and, if not, toggling whose turn it is. If the piece cannot be played, this call has no effect.
      Parameters:
      position - the position

    • tryRowCol

      public void tryRowCol(int row, int col)
      Tries to play a game piece at the specified position. If the piece can be played, this updates the model and view, including detecting whether the game has ended and, if not, toggling whose turn it is. If the piece cannot be played, this call has no effect.
      Parameters:
      row - the row
      col - the column

    • stopAll

      public void stopAll()
      Stops the timer.
